item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: indeed. never thought the guy i saw use a drill on a guitar for an hour at the tula arts festival in atlanta in 1994 would end up having anything remotely accessible enough to end up in an ad.
item.content:encoded: indeed. never thought the guy i saw use a drill on a guitar for an hour at the tula arts festival in atlanta in 1994 would end up having anything remotely accessible enough to end up in an ad.
